title: Result Analysis and Visualization
description: Automated semester results analysis using Python and Pandas, enabling data-driven academic insights through Matplotlib and Seaborn visualizations.

title: LeafPredict: Plant Disease Detection
description: Image-based plant disease detection using CNN and TensorFlow with Django backend. Achieved high accuracy using advanced preprocessing and augmentation.

title: E-commerce API
description: Built a secure and scalable e-commerce backend with role-based access using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and JWT. Included features like product management, search, and pagination.
